translations: n．女先知，女预言家：女性具有预言能力或被认为能够传达神圣信息的人。
· In ancient times, prophetesses were highly respected for their wisdom and insight.
在古代，女先知因其智慧和洞察力而受到高度尊敬。

sentences.sentence: Philip was classed as a prophet and his four daughters were also classed as prophetesses.
sentences.translation: 腓利和他的四个女儿同被誉为先知。
